items.title_original: The UI: Why It's the Real AI Agent Bottleneck
items.title_neutral: The UI: Why It's the Real AI Agent Bottleneck
items.excerpt: The User Interface (UI) is the real bottleneck for industrializing AI agents. Building an agent requires a specific skill set: LLM understanding, backend engineering, and prompt whispering. Building a good UI requires a completely different one: frontend development, UX design, and product sense.
